dcterms:creator: A. Conneau
G. Lample
R. Rinott
A. Williams
S. R. Bowman
H. Schwenk
V. Stoyanov
dcterms:description: The XNLI dataset is used to evaluate cross-lingual sentence representations, particularly in zero-resource settings where only labeled English data is used to fine-tune the model.
dcterms:title: XNLI

dcterms:creator: H. Schwenk
X. Li
dcterms:description: MLDoc is a multilingual document classification dataset that includes a class-balanced subset of the Reuters News dataset, used for text classification tasks.
dcterms:title: MLDoc

dcterms:creator: E. F. Sang
F. De Meulder
dcterms:description: The CoNLL 2002/2003 dataset is used for language-independent named entity recognition tasks, providing a benchmark for evaluating NER systems.
dcterms:title: CoNLL 2002/2003

dcterms:description: RCV1 and RCV2 are datasets used for text classification tasks, but specific details are not provided in the paper.
dcterms:title: RCV1 and RCV2

dcterms:description: The german.train.10000 dataset is a subset of the MLDoc corpus used for language-adversarial training, but specific details are not provided in the paper.
dcterms:title: german.train.10000

dcterms:description: The french.train.10000 dataset is a subset of the MLDoc corpus used for language-adversarial training, but specific details are not provided in the paper.
dcterms:title: french.train.10000

dcterms:description: The english.train.1000 dataset is a subset of the MLDoc corpus used for classification tasks, but specific details are not provided in the paper.
dcterms:title: english.train.1000
